hotels.name: √Ömot
hotels.desc: Riverside estate retreat, hand-foraged meals, riverside saunas, 19th-century charm
hotels.longDesc: A historic Norwegian estate in remote fjords offering intuitive hospitality, riverside saunas, hand-foraged dining, and rooms steeped in 19th-century character. A retreat celebrating nature's simplicity and well-being.

hotels.name: Juvet Landscape Hotel
hotels.desc: Minimalist alpine lodge, dramatic mountain views, architecture-focused design
hotels.longDesc: A striking modernist hotel nestled in Norway's fjord landscape, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that frame dramatic mountain and waterfall views. Each room is a minimalist sanctuary designed for contemplation and nature immersion.

hotels.name: Manshausen Island
hotels.desc: Award-winning cabins immersed in nature, panoramic Nordic views, peaceful retreat
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive island retreat in Norway featuring award-winning cabins designed to bring guests as close to untouched nature as possible, offering serene Nordic landscapes and peaceful accommodation.

hotels.name: Union √òye
hotels.desc: Luxury mountain hotel, Cond√© Nast Gold List 2024, fjord views, bespoke experiences
hotels.longDesc: An exceptional luxury hotel recognized among the world's top 68 resorts. Union √òye offers unforgettable experiences in a stunning Norwegian setting with dedicated service and elegant accommodations.

hotels.name: Union Oye
hotels.desc: Cozy luxury hotel with exceptional rooms and inviting hygge atmosphere perfect for any weather
hotels.longDesc: A beautifully designed boutique hotel offering supremely comfortable rooms and warm hospitality, ideal for unwinding regardless of Norway's fickle weather.

hotels.name: Lill√∏y Lindenberg
hotels.desc: Private island resort, panoramic sea views, remote escape, sustainable luxury
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive private island retreat off Norway's west coast offering breathtaking panoramic views, intimate exclusivity, and a commitment to responsible, eco-conscious tourism.

hotels.name: Storfjord Hotel
hotels.desc: Michelin Key luxury, immersive experiences, thoughtful design, unforgettable service
hotels.longDesc: A Michelin Key certified luxury hotel in Norway delivering immersive experiences, thoughtful design, and service that leaves lasting impressions on guests.

hotels.name: THE THIEF
hotels.desc: Contemporary luxury hotel, rooftop bar, modern Scandinavian design, waterfront location
hotels.longDesc: A sleek, design-forward hotel in Oslo's Gr√ºnerl√∏kka district offering families modern comfort with artistic flair and easy access to museums and parks.

hotels.name: Scandic Lillehammer Hotel
hotels.desc: Family-friendly mountain hotel, ski-in access, swimming pool, cozy fireplaces, activities year-round
hotels.longDesc: Perfect for active families, this welcoming hotel offers direct ski access in winter and hiking adventures in summer, with excellent facilities for children.

hotels.name: Opus XVI, an SLH Hotel
hotels.desc: Historic boutique hotel in Bergen's UNESCO Bryggen district

restaurants.name: Maaemo
restaurants.desc: Three Michelin-star fine dining, innovative Nordic cuisine, tasting menu experience
restaurants.longDesc: Oslo's most celebrated restaurant showcasing cutting-edge Scandinavian cooking with seasonal ingredients, offering an unforgettable gastronomic journey.

restaurants.name: Hekkan Burger Bergen
restaurants.desc: Casual burger joint, craft beer, relaxed atmosphere, excellent local ingredients
restaurants.longDesc: A laid-back favorite in Bergen's lively food scene, serving creative burgers and local craft beers in a welcoming, family-approved environment.

experiences.name: Narvik
experiences.desc: Arctic Norwegian port city, final train destination, gateway to Lofoten Islands
experiences.longDesc: A dramatic Arctic destination at the end of the overnight train journey, offering stunning mountain scenery, northern lights views, and easy access to the spectacular Lofoten Islands.

experiences.name: Lofoten Islands
experiences.desc: Iconic Arctic island chain, dramatic peaks, New Zealand-like scenery, accessible via bus from Narvik
experiences.longDesc: A breathtaking archipelago in Arctic Norway featuring jagged mountains rising from the sea, accessible by bus from Narvik and renowned for its otherworldly landscape and winter northern lights displays.

experiences.name: 62nord
experiences.desc: Luxury Porsche driving experience through Norwegian fjords, thrilling adventure with excellent service
experiences.longDesc: An exhilarating Porsche racing experience through the stunning fjords of Norway's Sunnm√∏re region, offering an unforgettable adrenaline-filled journey with impeccable hospitality.

experiences.name: Norwegian University of Science and Technology
experiences.desc: Major university, research hub, cultural institution
experiences.longDesc: Home to the Norwegian University of Science and Technology, a prestigious educational institution that transformed Trondheim into a vibrant college town with academic and cultural significance.
experiences.photoAttribution: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

experiences.name: Trondheim
experiences.desc: Historic Viking capital, culinary hub, emerging art center, fjord-surrounded town
experiences.longDesc: Founded by a Viking king in 997, this charming Norwegian city of 215,000 blends historic significance with contemporary culture, world-class dining, and a thriving art scene surrounded by pristine fjords and farms.

experiences.name: Solli Plass
experiences.desc: Design-focused Oslo neighborhood, art deco aesthetics, contemporary architecture hub
experiences.longDesc: A vibrant Oslo district celebrated for its curated design scene, architectural heritage, and contemporary dining establishments that showcase Nordic creativity.

experiences.name: 62 Nord
experiences.desc: Fjord kayaking adventures, Norwegian landscape exploration, water-based coolcation
experiences.longDesc: An immersive fjord experience in Norway offering kayaking adventures through dramatic waterways and alpine scenery, perfect for those seeking cool summer escape with active exploration.

experiences.name: Pulpit Rock
experiences.desc: Iconic cliff viewpoint, dramatic fjord views, scenic hiking trail, photography paradise
experiences.longDesc: One of Norway's most recognizable natural wonders, this breathtaking cliff offers families an exhilarating hike rewarded with stunning Lysefjord panoramas.

experiences.name: Munch
experiences.desc: World-class art museum, The Scream, Norwegian expressionism, modern architecture
experiences.longDesc: Housing Edvard Munch's masterpieces and extensive collection, this impressive museum introduces families to Norwegian artistic heritage in an engaging setting.

experiences.name: Trollstigen Utsiktpunkt
experiences.desc: Dramatic hairpin mountain pass with waterfalls and viewing platforms

kidFriendly.name: Kristiansand Zoo and Amusement Park
kidFriendly.desc: Family amusement park, zoo animals, rides and attractions, summer entertainment
kidFriendly.longDesc: Southern Norway's premier family destination combining a modern zoo with thrilling rides and attractions, ensuring days of joy for children of all ages.

markets.name: Mathallen Oslo
markets.desc: Indoor food market, local producers, gourmet delicacies, dining stalls, artisan goods
markets.longDesc: A bustling food hall showcasing Norway's best culinary artisans, from fresh seafood to local cheeses, perfect for family food discovery and casual dining.

a.name: Fjords, Farms & Fairytales: A Norway Family Adventure (10 Days)
a.description: An enchanting journey through Norway's most magical landscapes, from Oslo's urban charm to the UNESCO fjords, staying in storybook hotels where kids can explore riverside saunas, glass-walled forest rooms, and mountain trails at their own pace.
